data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Gampaha, Sri Lanka.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gampaha, Sri Lanka
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Gampaha hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Gampaha, Sri Lanka. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 62,800 people living in Gampaha through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Bania Mahajan people.
Lord, make the 5 believers in Gampaha to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 62,794 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 5 believers find a person of peace today among the 62,794 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Gampaha to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

location.name: Gampaha
location.people_groups_list: Deaf, Bania Mahesri, Bania Porwal, Bania Agarwal
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Deaf (107,000), Bania Mahesri (1,900), Bania Porwal (1,800), Bania Agarwal (21,000)
